languages.text: When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} levels of bleeding on all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: When the wearer ends their turn, they remove burning, bleeding, and toxin from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts bleeding with a power of <u>(10 + 2 × number of removed negative effects)</u> on all adjacent enemies.

When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts bleeding with a power of <u>(10 + 2 × number of removed {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g})</u> on all adjacent enemies.

When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts bleeding with a power of {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} on all adjacent enemies.

When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} levels of bleeding on all adjacent enemies.

languages.text: 着用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、隣接する全ての味方の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}を取り除く。その後、{uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc}のパワーで隣接する全ての敵に出血を与える。
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} levels of bleeding on all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: 着用者のターン終了時、隣接する全ての味方の炎上、出血、毒を取り除く。その後、<u>（10＋2×取り除いたマイナス効果の数）</u>のパワーで隣接する全ての敵に出血を与える。

着用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、隣接する全ての味方の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を取り除く。その後、{uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc}のパワーで隣接する全ての敵に出血を与える。

languages.text: 当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，移除周围所有邻近盟友身上的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。在此之后，装备者对周围所有邻近敌人施加{uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc}层流血效果。
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} levels of bleeding on all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，移除周围所有邻近盟友身上的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。在此之后，装备者对周围所有邻近敌人施加{uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc}层流血效果。

当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，移除周围所有邻近盟友身上的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。在此之后，装备者对周围所有邻近敌人施加流血状态，强度等同于{uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc}。

languages.text: Cuando el portador termina su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, cura los efectos negativos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} de los aliados adyacentes. Después, el portador inflige {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} niveles de hemorragia a todos los enemigos adyacentes.
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} levels of bleeding on all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador termina su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, cura los efectos negativos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} de los aliados adyacentes. Después, el portador inflige {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} niveles de hemorragia a todos los enemigos adyacentes.

Cuando el portador termina su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, cura los efectos negativos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} de los aliados adyacentes. Después, el portador inflige sangrado con una potencia de {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} a todos los enemigos adyacentes.

languages.text: Beendet der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, entfernt er von allen angrenzenden Verbündeten die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}. Anschließend belegt der Träger alle angrenzenden Gegner mit {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} Stufen Blutung.
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} levels of bleeding on all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: Beendet der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}, entfernt er von allen angrenzenden Verbündeten die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}. Anschließend belegt der Träger alle angrenzenden Gegner mit {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} Stufen Blutung.

Wenn der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} beendet, entfernt er bei allen angrenzenden Verbündeten die negativen Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}. Anschließend verursacht der Träger bei allen angrenzenden Feinden Blutung mit einer Kraft von {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc}.

languages.text: À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur, les effets négatifs {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} qui s'appliquaient à tous les alliés adjacents sont supprimés. L'utilisateur inflige ensuite {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} niveaux de l'effet Saignement à tous les ennemis adjacents.
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} levels of bleeding on all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur, les effets négatifs {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} qui s'appliquaient à tous les alliés adjacents sont supprimés. L'utilisateur inflige ensuite {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} niveaux de l'effet Saignement à tous les ennemis adjacents.

À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur, les effets négatifs {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} qui s'appliquaient à tous les alliés adjacents sont supprimés. L'utilisateur inflige alors l'effet Saignement à tous les ennemis adjacents avec une puissance de {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc}.

À la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur, les effets négatifs {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} qui s'appliquaient à tous les alliés adjacents sont supprimés. L'utilisateur inflige ensuite {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} niveaux de l'effet Saignement à tous les ennemis adjacents.

languages.text: Завершая свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, персонаж снимает с союзников на соседних клетках {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}. Затем персонаж накладывает {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} уровней кровотечения на всех противников на соседних клетках.
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} levels of bleeding on all adjacent enemies.

traits.locale_text: Завершая свой ход, персонаж снимает с союзников на соседних клетках горение, кровотечение и отравление. Затем персонаж накладывает кровотечение с интенсивностью <u>(10 + 2 × число снятых негативных эффектов)</u> на всех противников на соседних клетках.

Завершая свой ход, персонаж снимает с союзников на соседних клетках горение, кровотечение и отравление. Затем персонаж накладывает кровотечение с интенсивностью <u>(10 + 2 × число снятых негативных эффектов)</u> на всех противников на соседних клетках.

Завершая свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, персонаж снимает с союзников на соседних клетках {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}. Затем персонаж накладывает кровотечение с интенсивностью {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} на всех противников на соседних клетках.

languages.text: Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunu{/g} sonlandırırken bitişikteki tüm dost birimleri üzerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkilerini ortadan kaldırır. Takan kişi, ardından bitişikteki tüm düşmanlar üzerinde {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} seviye kanama oluşturur.
languages.original_text: When the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they remove {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from all adjacent allies. Then the wearer inflicts {uip|Power|be21ee63735043728f13823e5568c5cc} levels of bleeding on all adjacent enemies.
